chunks.text: This was a multi-agency fire investigation day.
This test was to evaluate the thermal runaway effect on a high-energy battery pack,
also to test extinguishing techniques for emergency firefighting.
In this test, we evaluated carbon dioxide extinguishers,
phone extinguishers which were partially effective,
and a fire blanket which contained the fire until it was exploded off.
We determined that the main factor that you need to have is an evacuation plan and make sure it's working.

text: This was a multi-agency fire investigation day. This test was to evaluate the thermal runaway effect on a high-energy battery pack, also to test extinguishing techniques for emergency firefighting. In this test, we evaluated carbon dioxide extinguishers, phone extinguishers which were partially effective, and a fire blanket which contained the fire until it was exploded off. We determined that the main factor that you need to have is an evacuation plan and make sure it's working.
